items.name: Valid Passport
items.description: Indian passport with at least 2 blank pages
items.personalizedDetail: Passport must be valid until at least September 25, 2026 (6 months after return)

items.name: Business Invitation Letter
items.description: Official invitation from German company on letterhead stating purpose, duration, and financial responsibility

items.name: Employment Proof
items.description: Employment certificate from employer on company letterhead stating position, salary, and leave approval

items.name: Bank Statements
items.description: Bank statements for last 6 months showing sufficient funds (min €45-50/day)

items.name: Income Tax Returns
items.description: IT returns (Form 16 or ITR acknowledgment) for the last 3 years

items.name: Travel Itinerary
items.description: Confirmed flight reservations showing entry and exit from Schengen area

items.name: Accommodation Proof
items.description: Hotel bookings or invitation letter with accommodation details for entire stay

items.name: Travel Insurance
items.description: Travel medical insurance covering min €30,000 for entire Schengen area and full stay duration

items.name: Cover Letter
items.description: Personal cover letter explaining trip purpose, itinerary, and ties to India

items.name: Completed Visa Application Form
items.description: Schengen visa application form — filled online or on paper at VFS appointment

items.name: Biometric Passport Photos
items.description: Two biometric photos (35x45mm, white background) — bring to VFS appointment

items.name: VFS Appointment
items.description: In-person appointment at VFS Global Visa Application Centre for biometrics and document submission

importantNotes: Business visa does not permit paid employment in Germany
Apply no more than 6 months and no less than 15 working days before travel
All documents not in English or German must be translated and notarized
Schengen visa allows travel throughout Schengen area
commonRejectionReasons: Insufficient bank balance or irregular transaction history
Weak ties to home country (no property, unstable employment)
Travel insurance not covering full Schengen area or trip duration

financialThresholds.notes: 6 months of bank statements required; consistent balance preferred over sudden deposits
